StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIUpdateContract]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @NWAID int, @ContractBeginDate date.me, @ComponentCode varchar(3), @PayGradeCode varchar(3), @ProjectedShipDate date.me, @ProjectedTrainingOrgID int, @TermOfEnlistment int, @YouthProgramCode varchar(3), @DateOfAc.on date.me, @DaysAllowedInDEP int, @UserLogin varchar(15) ) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100) DECLARE @ContractID int DECLARE @Disposi.on VARCHAR(4) DECLARE @DEPHoldFlag BIT
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
SELECT @Disposi.on = CS.DISPOSITION_CODE FROM NWA N INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(CS2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS CS2 WHERE CS.NWA_ID = CS2.NWA_ID) WHERE N.NWA_ID = @NWAID
IF(@Disposi.on = 'DH') BEGIN SET @DEPHoldFlag = 1 END ELSE BEGIN SET @DEPHoldFlag = 0 END
--Begin Delayed DEP Logic IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MIContract WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN INSERT INTO MIContract ( [NWA_ID] ,[CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE] ,[COMPONENT_CODE] ,[PAY_GRADE_CODE] ,[PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE] ,[PROJECTED_TRAINING_ORG_ID] ,[TERM_OF_ENLISTMENT] ,[STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE] ,[DAYS_ALLOWED_IN_DEP] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[CONTRACTED_IN_MCRISS] ,[ENTNAC_SUBMIT_DATE] ,[ENTNAC_COMPLETE_DATE] ,[DEP_HOLD] ) SELECT @NWAID ,@ContractBeginDate ,@ComponentCode ,@PayGradeCode ,@ProjectedShipDate ,@ProjectedTrainingOrgID ,@TermOfEnlistment ,@DateOfAc.on ,@DaysAllowedInDEP ,@UserLogin ,GETDATE() ,0 ,NULL ,NULL ,@DEPHoldFlag END --End Delayed DEP Logic
/* Begin Old Logic
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CONTRACT WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = USMC.GetMaxStatusID(@NWAID) AND STATUS_CODE = 'B' AND DISPOSITION_CODE = 'K') BEGIN --- UPDATE CONTRACT UPDATE CONTRACT SET PAY_GRADE_CODE = @PayGradeCode, PROJECTED_TRAINING_ORG_ID = @ProjectedTrainingOrgID, TERM_OF_ENLISTMENT = @TermOfEnlistment, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID END ELSE BEGIN --- UPDATE CONTRACT UPDATE CONTRACT SET CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE = @ContractBeginDate, COMPONENT_CODE = @ComponentCode, PAY_GRADE_CODE = @PayGradeCode, PROJECTED_TRAINING_ORG_ID = @ProjectedTrainingOrgID, TERM_OF_ENLISTMENT = @TermOfEnlistment, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID END END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT CONTRACT DATA INSERT INTO CONTRACT ( NWA_ID, CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, COMPONENT_CODE, PAY_GRADE_CODE, PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, PROJECTED_TRAINING_ORG_ID, TERM_OF_ENLISTMENT, DAYS_ALLOWED_IN_DEP, USER_LOGIN,UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( @NWAID, @ContractBeginDate, @ComponentCode, @PayGradeCode, @ProjectedShipDate, @ProjectedTrainingOrgID, @TermOfEnlistment, @DaysAllowedInDEP, @UserLogin, GETDATE() )
--- GET THE NEW CONTRACT ID SELECT @ContractID = @@IDENTITY
--- INSERT A NEW CANDIDATE STATUS RECORD INSERT INTO CANDIDATE_STATUS ( NWA_ID, STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, STATUS_TYPE, STATUS_CODE, DISPOSITION_CODE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( @NWAID, @DateOfAc.on, 'E', 'B', 'K', @UserLogin, GETDATE() )
--- VERIFY THE APPLICANT'S EDUCATION RECORD(S) AT CONTRACT EXEC sp_VerifyEduca.onAtContract @NWAID = @NWAID, @ContractID = @ContractID, @ContractBeginDate = @ContractBeginDate, @UserLogin = @UserLogin END
End Old Logic */
SET NOCOUNT OFF
